alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Carroll; Henry; Jo Daviess; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 10:13PM CST until December 15 at 10:45PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST FOR WHITESIDE...HENRY...JO DAVIESS...CARROLL...WESTERN STEPHENSON AND WESTERN BUREAU COUNTIES... At 1013 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Winslow to near Cambridge, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Freeport, Sterling, Kewanee, Rock Falls, Morrison, Cambridge, Mount Carroll, Geneseo, Colona, Coal Valley, Fulton, Savanna, Lena, Galva, Prophetstown, Stockton, Orion, Erie and Lanark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for north central and northwestern Illinois...and east central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Bureau; Carroll; Henry; Jo Daviess; Stephenson; Whiteside
